tasks.task_description: Examine the merged CSV file structure and sample data
Examine the Excel file structure and content
Create comprehensive analysis script with data matching capabilities
Generate detailed rejection analysis with patterns and trends
Create actionable insights and recommendations report

description: Create advanced claims analysis script to analyze merged CSV data, extract Excel data, match datasets, and provide comprehensive rejection analysis with insights and action plans
context: Created comprehensive claims analysis script with detailed rejection analysis, temporal trends, provider performance, and actionable recommendations. The script analyzes the merged CSV data structure and provides insights.

Completed comprehensive claims analysis with advanced patterns, insurer-specific analysis, recovery plans, and executive dashboard. Generated multiple actionable reports including high-value rejections for appeal, insurer contact priorities, and executive summary with key insights.
